attributes.action: to call upon the Chinese leadership to exercise restraint in dealing with recent protests in Tibet, and to encourage China to work towards a meaningful and lasting solution through dialogue with His Holiness the Dalai Lama.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the Prime Minister to follow other world leaders in condemning the use of force by the Chinese military in response to peaceful protests in Lhasa and other parts of Tibet. We also request the Prime Minister to call upon the Chinese leadership to respect the basic human rights of the Tibetan people and to meet His Holiness the Dalai Lama for negotiations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " to call upon the Chinese leadership to exercise restraint in dealing with recent protests in Tibet, and to encourage China to work towards a meaningful and lasting solution through dialogue with His Holiness the Dalai Lama."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15758.asp
